settings.content: Theme settings allow designers to provide an easy way for any user to customize the look and feel of their shop without having to delve into HTML or CSS code. Please see our [help page on theme settings](http://docs.shopify.com/themes/theme-templates/settings) to learn more about how you can make your theme customizable.

settings.label: Use image or text for logo?

settings.content: Maximum logo dimensions are 500px wide by 200px high.Your uploaded file will be resized to fit within those constraints.

settings.label: Mega Menu Items
settings.info: Use "," to separate mega menu items (no white space after ",") if you have multiple mega menus. For ex: Catalog,Shop Center,About

settings.info: Only enabled in the ajax cart if you use your cart.liquid markup. See docs below.

options.value: Congo, The Democratic Republic Of The

settings.content: If your customer is logged-in, the country in his default shipping address will be selected. If you are not sure about the spelling to use above, refer to your first checkout page.

settings.label: Shipping rates calculator submit button label
Shipping rates calculator submit button label when calculating
Allow shopper to see prices in his own currency?

settings.content: Separate your currency codes with a space. Use the ISO 4217 3-letter currency code. Click [here](http://www.xe.com/iso4217.php) for a complete list of currency codes. Example: CAD USD.

* For this functionality to work in your shop, you are required to edit your money formats as per [these instructions](http://wiki.shopify.com/How_to_Show_Multiple_Currencies#Do_tell_where_the_money_is) (“Do tell where the money is”).

settings.label: Enable Lazy Loading Effect on PC?
Enable Lazy Loading Effect on Mobile Devices?
